title: Vitamin World Wild Yam 14% With Aloe & Vitamin E Balancing Herbal For Women Net WT. 4 oz. (113 g)
features: . With Aloe & Vitamin E . Balancing Herbal Cream for Women .Women Experiencing Midlife Chaanges
description: DESCRIPTION This Wild Yam cream 14% is a balancing herbal cream for women and contains aloe and vitamin E. Wild Yam Cream is often used by women experiencing midlife changes. This rich moisturizing cream combines wild yam root extract with the benefits of vitamin E, aloe vera, safflower, and chamomile for a truly soothing experience. No mineral oil. No artificial color or fragrance. 4 oz. cream. Read Less LABEL INFORMATION Directions: Rub a small amount (1/4 - 1/2 teaspoon) into the skin under your upper arms, on your breasts and around your stomach. For best results, use twice daily for 8 to 10 weeks. INGREDIENTS: Water, Dioscorea Villosa (Wild Yam) Root Extract, Glyceryl Stearate, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Stearic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Triethanolamine, Diazolidinyl Urea Methylparaben, Sodium Hyaluronate, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Propylparaben, Disodium EDTA, Tocopheryl Acetate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice. NO MINERAL OIL. NO ARTIFICIAL COLOR OR FRAGRANCE.
